package.name: Stagehand_Autoload
package.description: Stagehand_Autoload provides class loaders for autoloading classes and interfaces which are based on the Package\Class or Package_Class style naming conventions.

release.notes:
Release Date: 2009-08-20
What's New in Stagehand_Autoload 0.2.0
New APIs:
The following new APIs have been added to use autoload more explicitly:
* Stagehand_Autoload::register() * Stagehand_Autoload::getLoader() * Stagehand_Autoload_Loader_LegacyLoader for the Package_Class style naming convension * Stagehand_Autoload_Loader_NamespaceLoader for the Package\Class style naming convension for PHP 5.3
For more information, see the Reference Guide.
The first beta release of Stagehand_Autoload.
